title.narrative: Girls and boys with disabilities have improved access to quality education in mainstream schools in intervention areas

description.narrative: In 2017, 19 additional public schools were capacitated as inclusive schools to mainstream education to children with mild disabilities, and additional 389 teachers enhanced their skills and knowledge on pedagogy and classroom management for improved teaching and learning in inclusive schools. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:28/01/2018
